revised_title: Discovery of a New Series of Lines in the Magnesium Spectrum
tldr: The authors, A. Fowler and H. L. Callendar, discovered a new series of lines in the spectrum of magnesium. They found that these lines constituted a regular series associated with the stronger series described by Rydberg. The new series, along with the two well-known subordinate series of triplets, were found in the arc spectrum of magnesium. This discovery added to the understanding of the atomic spectra of elements.
